name: Palais des Arts
uniques: Trigger on turn start: If city does not have status [TourismDisabled], Add [6] [Tourism] to this city
civilopediaText: Grand museum: culture + city-level tourism and big loyalty boost on build.

name: Salon Litteraire
uniques: Passive: TourismGainScaleWithScience:10% per 50 science in city
civilopediaText: Literary salon: culture + tourism; tourism scales with city's science (education).

name: Academie de Mode
civilopediaText: Fashion academy: culture, tourism and loyalty; higher maintenance due to luxury industry.

name: Elysee Palace
uniques: Add [5] Loyalty empire-wide on construction (temporary 50 turns)
civilopediaText: Elysee Palace: large loyalty at capital and temporary empire morale boost.

name: Industrial Engineers Corps
uniques: Add [15] Loyalty when repairing captured city buildings
civilopediaText: Engineer corps: speeds reconstruction and gives loyalty when used to repair captured cities.
